name: DailyDremel
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Daily inspiration and guidance, project ideas, tips and promotions for Makers and DIY-buffs from your friends at Dremel. Topics include home and gardening, crafting, home improvement, woodworking and more. Each new day brings a message to inspire, motivate, and empower you to make more. Whether you’re a hobbyist, maker, tinkerer, crafter or a pro, the Daily Dremel is here to help.
 
Dremel celebrates 85 years in business and maintains its commitment to innovation and quality. Regardless of what the task may be, the Dremel brand is dedicated to empowering Makers through creativity, precision and project enjoyment.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
